resp = client.indices.create(
    index="idx",
    mappings={
        "_source": {
            "mode": "synthetic"
        },
        "properties": {
            "long": {
                "type": "long"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

    index="idx",
    id="1",
    document={
